name: Sarlacc (V)
Lore: 'Very patient predator in the Dune Sea. Tentacles can grab prey up to four meters away. Digests victims for 1000 years. Often fed prisoners by Jabba the Hutt.',
Text: '* Ferocity = 4 + destiny. Habitat: Great Pit Of Carkoon. X = number of your aliens here. Captives here are power -X. Anything eaten by Sarlacc is placed out of play (if a captive, retrieve up to X Force).',
